messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschoolers for MaryB
messages.messageBody:
From: <starsuncloud@...>


<< Mary,
You had said something about there not being many unschoolers in your area.
I thought you might want to check out this website. It's a network of
support
groups in Florida that are inclusive. It may lead you to some unschoolers.
This is the affiliation our group is
listed with and part of.
http://www.lifeofflorida.org/>>


Thanks Ren, already had it.

Mary B

messages.subject: Unschoolers for MaryB
messages.msgSnippet: Mary, You had said something about there not being many unschoolers in your area. I thought you might want to check out this website. It s a network of support
messages.messageBody:
Mary,
You had said something about there not being many unschoolers in your area.
I thought you might want to check out this website. It's a network of support
groups in Florida that are inclusive.
It may lead you to some unschoolers. This is the affiliation our group is
listed with and part of.
http://www.lifeofflorida.org/

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
